name: wonder-room
effect: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
short_effect: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
